channel.title: Router/Modem Server
channel.description: Hey, i have a router seperate to my modem and i disconected the router so i can run my server just using my modem and iv got my ip and put it in as the server ip but when i try conecting it says must be down and i cant get on it any ideas why?

item.title: Router/Modem Server
item.dc:creator: @Got_Java Got Java?
item.description:
@Got_Java wrote:

[quote=“i–own–i, post:1, topic:123093”]Hey, i have a router seperate to my modem and i disconected the router so i can run my server just using my modem and iv got my ip and put it in as the server ip but when i try conecting it says must be down and i cant get on it any ideas why?[/quote]Simply because you have to port forward. Sign up to No-ip then check what your Ip is then type this in to your address bar:

http://IPHERE

Then go to additional options and such ;D Then port forward.

Read full topic

item.title: Router/Modem Server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

if you are hosting on your computer, you need to type in server ip: 127.0.0.1

if you know your external ip, you put that ip in the server status page.

if you don’t have a router or you dissconnected it like what you did then you just need to run your server and submit to server status

Remember, No router No port forwarding!

Read full topic
